right.text: THERE IS NO SEMEN ON THESE SHIRTS, STOP MESSING WITH MY DAMN MIND

left.text: fine, fine, enjoy your semen shirts

right.text: soon you hear voices... little tiny voices... millions of them saying "hello, we are lost... can you help us find the way to the egg?"

left.text: this is nothing compared to what will happen if you keep wearing them

right.text: i am not listening to you

left.text: ... will you sleep in these clothes? like, will you be sleeping with sperm swimming on you?
